tool_description: Aggregates review data by product to calculate comprehensive performance metrics including average ratings, review counts, sentiment scores, and quality indicators.

review_ids.description: List of review IDs to aggregate by product

product_ids.description: List of product IDs to analyze

include_sentiment.description: Whether to include sentiment analysis in aggregation

weight_by_helpfulness.description: Whether to weight reviews by helpfulness scores

min_reviews_threshold.description: Minimum number of reviews required for reliable metrics

time_decay_factor.description: Factor for weighting recent reviews more heavily (0.0-1.0)

exclude_outliers.description: Whether to exclude statistical outliers from calculations

performance_categories.description: Performance aspects to analyze: quality, value, service, delivery

error_messages: Empty input data: Both review_ids and product_ids arrays cannot be empty
Mismatched data: No reviews found for the specified product IDs
Invalid threshold: min_reviews_threshold must be a positive integer
Invalid decay factor: time_decay_factor must be between 0.0 and 1.0
Invalid performance categories: Use combination of [quality, value, service, delivery]
Insufficient data: One or more products have insufficient reviews for reliable aggregation
usage: Provide review and product IDs, then configure aggregation parameters such as sentiment inclusion and weighting options. Returns comprehensive product performance metrics.

product_metrics.description: Aggregated metrics summary for each product

review_counts.description: Total number of reviews for each product

sentiment_scores.description: Average sentiment score for each product
